page.title: 12Merdon Manor (3)
page.content: Life Styles =========== During the for centuries of the manor's exsistence , the quality of living there has changed dramatically. In 1559 it would have been a miserably cold house , but , one supposes , the addition of cellars in the eighteenth century would make an improvement , because one room of these cellars was set aside as a boiler room . A coal shute went up from here to the outside before it was filled in in 1981 . In the nineteenth century living standards improved beyond all measure, and by the turn of the century it must have been luxury compared to 1559 , with the addition of basic electric lighting , and a good heating system . Since then , the modern technological era has taken over - the boilers are electric run and only take up an >>>>>
